name: Apothecary
description: A shop specializing in herbs, potions, and remedies; adventurers can buy healing salves, antidotes, or consult the apothecary for rare ingredients.
atmosphere: The shop is filled with the rich, earthy scent of herbs and the sweet aroma of healing potions. Glass bottles and ceramic jars line the shelves, each containing colorful powders and liquids. The air carries the promise of healing and the subtle hint of magical properties.
